list.title: Blonde® Americano Misto
list.description: Seriously smooth and subtly sweet Blonde® Espresso layered with hot water then steamed milk for an authentic, handcrafted espresso beverage.

list.title: Caffè Americano Misto
list.description: Bold Espresso shots layered with hot water then steamed milk for an authentic, handcrafted espresso beverage.

list.title: Cappuccino
list.description: Dark, rich espresso lies in wait under a smoothed and stretched layer of thick milk foam. An alchemy of barista artistry and craft.

list.title: Flat White
list.description: Smoothristretto shots of espresso get the perfect amount of steamed whole milk to create a not-too-strong, not-too-creamy, just-right flavour.

list.title: Apple Oat Flat White
list.description: This flat white combines Starbucks® signature Espresso Roast with a steamed oat beverage and apple flavours, topped with a clove-sugar topping.

list.title: Caffè Latte
list.description: Our dark, rich espresso balanced with steamed milk and a light layer of foam. A perfect milk-forward warm-up.
